programme.desc: Di hoskan oleh Anas Ridzuan, Huru Hara kali ini pasti membuatkan anda terhibur sambil bergelak ketawa. Dalam episod ini kita santai santai bersama barisan artis yang terdiri daripada Mal Hamka, Elly Arifin, Aloy Paradoks dan Dunya Band.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: Seorang samseng yang ingin menjadi pelakon; seorang pelakon yang lebih gangster daripada segala-galanya. Di sini laluan dan kehidupan mereka mula bersilang.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: Krew siri web seram pergi ke rumah puaka terbiar untuk siaran langsung. Mereka akan menemui sesuatu lebih daripada yang dijangkakan apabila mereka bergerak lebih dalam ke dalam bangunan lama yang mengerikan itu.

programme.title: The Kill List
programme.desc: Selepas mengetahui siapa yang membunuh ibu bapanya, seorang pembunuh upahan berhasrat untuk membalas dendam berdarah, manakala pada masa yang organisasi dimana dia bekerja berusaha menjejakinya

programme.title: Janin Tak Berdosa
programme.desc: Pasangan suami isteri muda Firman dan Julia merancang berbulan madu di Amsterdam selepas Firman mendapat kenaikan pangkat di syarikatnya. Oleh kerana pada masa itu Julia mengandung dan beliau ingin meneruskan percutiannya maka mereka merancang menggugurkan kandungan itu.

programme.title: Phobia 2
programme.desc: An anthology of five macabre short stories about hungry ghosts, comatose brain dead, a group of bright-eyed actors, an unscrupulous car salesman, and careless backpack tourists.

programme.title: Nak Dengar Cerita Hantu Ep 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lekaki yang membela hantu raya yang di warisi oleh ayahnya dengan terpaksa. Namun lama kelamaan dia mula suka dengan saka belaan tersebut. Setelah bertahun-tahun dan usianya yang menghampiri kematian, pak Harun mula sedar dan cuba membuang hantu raya tersebut yang mula menganggu penduduk kampung. Apatah lagi anak gadisnya putus tunang akibat dia membela hantu raya tersebut. Pak Harun akhirnya berjaya membuang hantu raya tersebut dengan bantuan seorang ustaz. Pak harun akhirnya meninggal dunia, anak dan isterinya berpindah selepas kematian pak harun

programme.title: Jwanita
programme.desc: Jwanita (Maya Karin) yang sakit mental dan didera oleh Ibu / Dukun (Umie Aida) dan bapa angkatnya (Radin Intan), yang mengamalkan ilmu hitam. Jwanita kemudian bertemu dengan Farhan (Bront Palarae) yang menjaganya selepas dia membunuh kedua ibu bapa angkatnya dalam satu peristiwa tragis.

programme.title: Laddaland
programme.desc: Apabila sebuah keluarga berpindah ke Laddaland, sebuah pembangunan perumahan mewah dengan rumah yang besar dan cantik, mereka mendapati kehidupan di kawasan kejiranan baharu mereka tidak begitu sempurna apabila mereka menghadapi satu siri peristiwa paranormal yang menakutkan yang mendorong keluarga itu ke pinggir kegilaan.

programme.title: TABU: Mengusik Gerbang Iblis
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sekumpulan 6 orang sahabat muda yang secara tidak sengaja memasuki hutan larangan di Leuweung Hejo. Mereka ialah Diaz, Keyla, Tio , Adis, Muti dan Mahir. Selepas memasuki hutan, mereka menjalankan aktiviti yang dianggap pantang larang.

programme.title: Anak Jantan
programme.desc: Anak Jantan menceritakan kisah Darin yang dihantui oleh kehidupan yang lalu. Gaya hidup negatifnya berubah sama sekali apabila beliau jatuh cinta kepada seorang wanita dari kampungnya bernama Nara. Tidak lama kemudian, pasangan ini berhijrah ke bandar KL untuk memulakan kehidupan baru. Mereka dikurniakan seorang anak lelaki yang bijak bernama Saufi. Malangnya, kebahagiaan keluarga mereka tidak bertahan lama dengan ketibaan Somchai, seorang rakan lama yang kembali menyebabkan pergolakan di tempat kerja Darin.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Adam, Shah dan Danial tiga pemuda di sebuah kampung yang baru balik belajar dalam bidang kejuruteraan dari Jepun. Akibat masalah sukar mendapat pekerjaan Adam telah membeli alat pengesan lembaga bersama-sama dengan alat pengesan, alat penyedut serta alatan yang berkaitan tujuan untuk mengesan dan menangkap lembaga yang merupakan lembaga-lembaga yang sesekali masih wujud dan mengganggu manusia atau keluarga. Ibu-ibu mereka juga tidak senang hati yang mereka tidak ada kerja dan mencebur diri dengan kerja tersebut. Dalam pada itu hasil kerja mereka menjadi tersohor dan tersebar dalam akhbar tempatan. Sementara itu Encik Bad, seorang pengusaha muzium lembaga-lembaga dan anak gadisnya telah berpindah ke rumah baru mereka. Cuma setiap malam kedua-dua mereka mengalami gangguan dipercayai daripada lembaga yang belum dikenal pasti.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep19
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Operasi X
programme.desc: ASP Redzuan sudah tidak percaya lagi dengan pegawai polis lain apabila dia menyaksikan kematian rakan baiknya, Inspektor Aman, yang dipercayai dibunuh oleh pihak polis. Dia kemudian memutuskan komunikasi dengan semua orang dan mula tinggal di sebuah pulau terpencil, menyembunyikan identitinya daripada penduduk di situ. Tetapi SAC Dato' Mokhtar dan DSP Anwar dari Bukit Aman dapat menjejakinya. Dia kemudian ditugaskan untuk mengetuai operasi yang dinamakan Operasi X untuk menumpaskan Geng Belut

programme.title: Usop Wilcha Meghonjang Makhluk Muzium
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang pihak sebuah muzium yang menganjurkan pameran hantu-hantu dunia dalam usaha menarik orang ramai kembali datang ke muzium. Penganjuran pameran hantu dunia ini tanpa disedaridi rancang oleh pihak tertentu dalam usaha untuk menghidupkan Count Dracula. Kehidupan abadi yang diinginkan oleh Dracula ini pasti akan menyebabkan keadaan negara menjadi huru-hara. Bagaimanapun, rancangan licik kumpulan ini disedari oleh patung-patung tokoh lama yang mempunyai semangat untuk memastikan rancanga ini gagal. Perak Man, Sultan Melaka, Bendahara Tun Perpatih Putih, Datuk Maharaja Lela bersama siPutum terpaksa berkomunikasi dengan orang luar yang mereka boleh percayai bagi menggagalkan rancangan jahat kumpulan itu.

programme.title: 4 Tahun Tinggal Di Rumah Hantu
programme.desc: 4 Tahun Tinggal di Rumah Hantu adalah film horor Indonesia yang dirilis pada tahun 2014. Film ini merupakan adaptasi sebuah novel berdasarkan kisah nyata yang menceritakan rumah hantu di Kota Depok, Jawa Barat

programme.title: The Hotel
programme.desc: Sarapee dan Pun mewarisi rumah agam pantai daripada Luang Narubal, suami dan dermawan yang mereka khianati dan tinggalkan untuk mati dalam kesedihan. Kedua-duanya kini memutuskan untuk berpindah dan menjadikan rumah agam itu sebagai hotel untuk menjana wang. Dua puluh lima tahun berlalu. Sarapee telah meninggal dunia. Dua anaknya hasil perkahwinannya dengan Pun, Parinya dan Patama, kini sudah dewasa dan mereka pulang dari menetap di luar negara untuk mengambil alih hotel tersebut. Selepas mengubahsuainya, misteri bermula. Kematian berlaku berulang kali, dan kadangkala Parinya dan Pattama menyaksikannya. Tidak lama kemudian mereka adalah satu-satunya orang yang tinggal untuk membongkar misteri dan berjuang untuk terus hidup. Tetapi siapakah pembunuh misteri itu?

programme.title: Ritual
programme.desc: Peter, dan isterinya jenny, serta anak perempuan mereka lisa, dan kekasihnya michael berkelah di satu tempat yang terpencil. Pelbagai perkara seram terjadi sepanjang mereka disana.

programme.title: Karak
programme.desc: Empat pelajar kolej akan pulang ke Kuantan selepas bermalam di KL, apabila mereka terperangkap dalam kesesakan besar-besaran di sepanjang Lebuhraya Karak. Jadi untuk membuatnya kembali untuk kelas mereka keesokan harinya, mereka memutuskan untuk keluar dari jalan raya dan melanjutkan perjalanan mereka di sepanjang jalan batang tua ... Keputusan itu akan mengubah hidup mereka selama-lamanya

programme.title: Takien
programme.desc: Semasa memburu haiwan, Wittaya dan Lokrai secara tidak sengaja menyinggung perasaan Nang Ta-Kian, roh penjaga hutan, yang kemudian membunuh Lokrai. Wittaya terpaksa menjaga anak kawannya, Tong Kam. Sebagai seorang lelaki muda, Tong Kam jatuh cinta dengan anak perempuan Wittaya, Porn tetapi Wittaya lebih suka Trai, seorang jurutera awam yang datang ke kampung mereka untuk menyelaraskan pembinaan empangan. Apabila empangan itu siap, kampung itu banjir dan Wittaya ditugaskan untuk membersihkan setiap pokok, termasuk pokok Ta-Kian yang besar

programme.title: Anak Jantan
programme.desc: Anak Jantan menceritakan kisah Darin yang dihantui oleh kehidupan yang lalu. Gaya hidup negatifnya berubah sama sekali apabila beliau jatuh cinta kepada seorang wanita dari kampungnya bernama Nara. Tidak lama kemudian, pasangan ini berhijrah ke bandar KL untuk memulakan kehidupan baru. Mereka dikurniakan seorang anak lelaki yang bijak bernama Saufi. Malangnya, kebahagiaan keluarga mereka tidak bertahan lama dengan ketibaan Somchai, seorang rakan lama yang kembali menyebabkan pergolakan di tempat kerja Darin.

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: Sekumpulan rakan mendedahkan objek dunia lain di padang luar bandar yang mereka temui menyimpan rahsia yang lebih besar daripada yang mereka bayangkan.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep20
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Before The Fire
programme.desc: Ketika wabak global melanda Los Angeles, bintang TV yang sedang meningkat naik Ava Boone terpaksa meninggalkan kekacauan yang semakin memuncak dan kembali ke kampung halamannya di luar bandar. Semasa dia bergelut untuk menyesuaikan diri dengan cara hidup yang dia tinggalkan lama dahulu, kepulangannya menarik sosok berbahaya dari masa lalunya, mengancam dia dan keluarga yang menjadi satu-satunya tempat perlindungannya.

programme.title: Kembang Kantil
programme.desc: Untuk menghadiri persembahan teater Alisa (Bella Ireland) pergi ke rumah abangnya Anton (Fadika Royandi) dan isterinya Santi (Nafa Urbach). Di rumah Alisa bertemu Tania (Richelle Georgette Skonicki), anak angkat Anton dan Siska.

programme.title: The Hoarder
programme.desc: Ella dipaksa bekerja dengan sekumpulan orang asing yang menakutkan selepas terperangkap di kemudahan penyimpanan bawah tanah di mana dia mendapati dirinya diburu oleh pembunuh yang tidak dikenali.

programme.title: Hikayat Merong Mahawangsa
programme.desc: Pada tahun 120,Empayar Romketika itu di bawah pemerintahan Hadrian sementara di negara China,Dinasti Hanmerupakan sebuah empayar yang kuat dan telah memperluaskan pemerintahannya ke negara Asia Tengah. Semasa angkatan Rom sedang membaik pulih kapal mereka diGoa, mereka meminta pertolongan Merong Mahawangsa mengiringi Putera Rom ke Langkasuka (dikatakan terletak di utara Malaysia) untuk berkahwin dengan seorang Puteri China yang cantik dari Dinasti Han.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep4
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Adam, Shah dan Danial tiga pemuda di sebuah kampung yang baru balik belajar dalam bidang kejuruteraan dari Jepun. Akibat masalah sukar mendapat pekerjaan Adam telah membeli alat pengesan lembaga bersama-sama dengan alat pengesan, alat penyedut serta alatan yang berkaitan tujuan untuk mengesan dan menangkap lembaga yang merupakan lembaga-lembaga yang sesekali masih wujud dan mengganggu manusia atau keluarga. Ibu-ibu mereka juga tidak senang hati yang mereka tidak ada kerja dan mencebur diri dengan kerja tersebut. Dalam pada itu hasil kerja mereka menjadi tersohor dan tersebar dalam akhbar tempatan. Sementara itu Encik Bad, seorang pengusaha muzium lembaga-lembaga dan anak gadisnya telah berpindah ke rumah baru mereka. Cuma setiap malam kedua-dua mereka mengalami gangguan dipercayai daripada lembaga yang belum dikenal pasti.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep20
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Khun Pan
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Khun Pan 2
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

Apabila kerajaan Thai mengumumkan rancangan untuk mengosongkan bilik kebalnya untuk membayar balik pinjaman IMFnya, sekumpulan Mafia tempatan membuat satu skim untuk rompakan mega, mereka akan mencuri rizab emas negara. Mereka mengupah Navin yang terkenal, bekas pembunuh tentera, untuk mengetuai operasi yang melibatkan semua pencuri terkemuka di negara ini.

programme.title: Beyond Skyline
programme.desc: Seorang detektif memulakan usaha tanpa henti untuk membebaskan anaknya daripada kapal perang asing yang ngeri.

programme.title: The Invoking
programme.desc: Selepas mewarisi rumah daripada keluarga yang tidak pernah dikenalinya, Samantha Harris (Trin Miller) dan tiga rakannya menuju ke Sader Ridge luar bandar untuk memeriksa harta itu. Tidak lama selepas tiba, Sam mula mengalami penglihatan mengerikan tentang kekejaman ganas dan kejahatan yang tidak terkata. Diganggu oleh kuasa jahat yang mengepungnya, Sam mengalami mimpi ngeri apabila syaitan dari masa lalunya enggan terus dikebumikan lagi.

programme.title: Ritual
programme.desc: Peter, dan isterinya jenny, serta anak perempuan mereka lisa, dan kekasihnya michael berkelah di satu tempat yang terpencil. Pelbagai perkara seram terjadi sepanjang mereka disana.

programme.title: Siccin 2
programme.desc: Adnan dan Hicran selamat berkahwin namun apabila anak lelaki mereka meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan misteri Adanan menjadi jauh daripada isterinya. Hicran mula menyiasat masa lalunya untuk melihat bagaimana ia boleh dikaitkan dengan kematian anaknya.

programme.title: Phobia 2
programme.desc: An anthology of five macabre short stories about hungry ghosts, comatose brain dead, a group of bright-eyed actors, an unscrupulous car salesman, and careless backpack tourists.

programme.title: Nak Dengar Cerita Hantu Ep 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lekaki yang membela hantu raya yang di warisi oleh ayahnya dengan terpaksa. Namun lama kelamaan dia mula suka dengan saka belaan tersebut. Setelah bertahun-tahun dan usianya yang menghampiri kematian, pak Harun mula sedar dan cuba membuang hantu raya tersebut yang mula menganggu penduduk kampung. Apatah lagi anak gadisnya putus tunang akibat dia membela hantu raya tersebut. Pak Harun akhirnya berjaya membuang hantu raya tersebut dengan bantuan seorang ustaz. Pak harun akhirnya meninggal dunia, anak dan isterinya berpindah selepas kematian pak harun

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Filem ini bermula dengan dua orang anak, Nam-yi dan adik perempuannya Ja-in, dikejar oleh pengawal Raja Injo dan diselamatkan oleh bapa mereka Choi Pyeong-ryung, seorang pegawai Raja Gwanghae dan seorang pemanah yang mahir. Dia menghantar anak-anaknya untuk mencari tempat perlindungan dengan kawan baiknya Kim Mu-seon. Semasa mereka melarikan diri, Ja-in merayu abangnya untuk kembali kepada bapa mereka, tetapi Choi Pyeong-ryung dibunuh di hadapan Nam-yi. Nam-yi, walaupun digigit oleh anjing pengawal, membunuh mereka dan melarikan diri bersama Ja-in.

programme.title: Jambatan Maut
programme.desc: Untuk mempertahankan maruah diri daripada diganggu Haron, Hamidah telah mengambil keputusan untuk terjun ke dalam sungai dari sebuah jambatan. Dia kemudiannya dibawa arus deras dan hilang entah ke mana walaupun seorang lelaki bernama Ibrahim cuba menolongnya. Ibrahim yang dihalau keluar oleh bapanya tinggal di pondok berhampiran dengan jambatan di mana Hamidah terjun ke dalam sungai. Sedang Ibrahim mengarang lagu, Hamidah telah datang kepadanya dan mula timbul bibit-bibit cinta antara mereka. Hamidah juga memberitahu kepada Ibrahim bahawa dia ingin menghukum Haron dan rakan-rakannya yang sering mengancam keamanan kampung.

programme.title: Satria
programme.desc: Bongkok seorang pemuda cacat sejak dia dilahirkan. Dia sering dipandang hina oleh orang kampung kerana sifatnya yang tidak sempurna. Bongkok mempunyai seorang adik bernama Putra yang handal dalam ilmu persilatan. Putra memendam perasaan terhadap Wati, anak Tok Ketua. Pada suatu hari, Putra bersama rakannya, Durja dan beberapa orang pendekar telah diarahkan untuk menjadi utusan perdamaian antara Tok Ketua dengan Panglima Jalit. Malangnya rundingan perdamaian itu gagal dan berlaku pertumpahan darah. Bongkok pula membawa diri ke suatu tempat untuk mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Pak Guru. Satu komplot telah dibuat oleh Durja untuk merampas Wati daripada Putra.

programme.title: Pendekar Sakti
programme.desc: Sakti belajar ilmu persilatan dengan bapanya Mahaguru Buana. Selain itu, Dadah dan Dalang juga menjadi murid kepada Mahaguru Buana. Setelah tamat perguruan, ketiga-tiga pendekar ini membawa haluan masing-masing. Sakti keluar mengembara untuk mencari bapa saudaranya, Dadah pergi menuntut ilmu dengan mahaguru lain. Malangnya Dalang hanyut dalam ketamakan harta dan kuasa sehingga sanggup membunuh Mahaguru Buana. Apabila Sakti pulang, Dalang membuat fitnah dengan mengatakan kematian Mahaguru Buana adalah angkara Dadah. Sakti bersumpah untuk menuntut bela di atas kematian bapanya.

programme.title: Isi Neraka
programme.desc: Kedatangan agama Islam di sebuah kampung tidak disenangi oleh Wira dan rakan-rakannya. Mereka yang gemar membuat kacau di kampung itu sering mengganggu penyebaran dakwah Islam. Kehadiran Tuan Guru ke kampung itu juga telah membuatkan lebih ramai orang kampung memeluk Islam, namun Wira tetap mempersoalkan kekuasaan Tuhan.

programme.title: Mata Shaitan
programme.desc: Ketika keluar berburu di hutan, Tengku Aman Shah telah tertarik hati dengan seorang gadis bernama Manis yang tinggal bersama bapanya pinggir hutan. Tengku Aman Shah merahsiakan identitinya yang sebenar dan menyamar sebagai seorang penyair bernama Sulaiman. Setelah mendedahkan identitinya, Tengku Aman Shah berkahwin dengan Manis secara rahsia. Ketika Tengku Aman Shah pulang ke istana kerana ayahandanya gering, Manis yang sedang hamil diganggu sekumpulan samseng sehingga mengakibatkan kematian bapanya. Manis melarikan diri ke dalam hutan dan bertemu dengan seorang tua yang berwajah hodoh. Orang tua itu memberi perlindungan kepada Manis sehingga dia melahirkan anak.

programme.title: Puteri Gunung Banang
programme.desc: Wira dan dua orang abangnya, Terab dan Toba adalah tiga orang lelaki tua yang hidup di pinggir sebuah desa dalam keadaan miskin. Pada suatu hari, ketika Wira pergi ke Gunung Banang dia telah ditakdirkan untuk masuk ke alam bunian dan bertemu dengan seorang puteri. Wira terkejut apabila melihat wajahnya kembali muda. Sebelum meninggalkan alam bunian dan kembali ke alam nyata, Puteri Gunung Banang telah menghadiahkan Wira semangkuk air hikmat yang mampu menjadi penawar kepada pelbagai penyakit. Wira berjanji akan menggunakannya untuk membantu orang ramai. Apabila tiba di sebuah perkampungan, Wira berjaya memulihkan seorang gadis yang kurang siuman. Apabila berita kehebatan Wira mengubati pesakit ini tersebar, Terab dan Toba merasa iri hati dan merancang untuk melakukan sesuatu.

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Putera Amran, pewaris takhta kerajaan Zamin Ambar telah dititahkan oleh ayahandanya untuk berkahwin dengan Puteri Faridah dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Namun, Putera Amran tidak bersetuju dengan titah ayahandanya kerana dia mencintai seorang penari istana yang bernama Norlela. Kerajaan Zamin Tauran berasa amat terhina dan merancang sesuatu untuk mengambil alih tampuk pemerintahan kerajaan Zamin Ambar dengan cara Puteri Faridah mesti berkahwin dengan baginda sultan Zamin Tauran.

programme.title: Satria
programme.desc: Bongkok seorang pemuda cacat sejak dia dilahirkan. Dia sering dipandang hina oleh orang kampung kerana sifatnya yang tidak sempurna. Bongkok mempunyai seorang adik bernama Putra yang handal dalam ilmu persilatan. Putra memendam perasaan terhadap Wati, anak Tok Ketua. Pada suatu hari, Putra bersama rakannya, Durja dan beberapa orang pendekar telah diarahkan untuk menjadi utusan perdamaian antara Tok Ketua dengan Panglima Jalit. Malangnya rundingan perdamaian itu gagal dan berlaku pertumpahan darah. Bongkok pula membawa diri ke suatu tempat untuk mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Pak Guru. Satu komplot telah dibuat oleh Durja untuk merampas Wati daripada Putra.

programme.title: Pendekar Sakti
programme.desc: Sakti belajar ilmu persilatan dengan bapanya Mahaguru Buana. Selain itu, Dadah dan Dalang juga menjadi murid kepada Mahaguru Buana. Setelah tamat perguruan, ketiga-tiga pendekar ini membawa haluan masing-masing. Sakti keluar mengembara untuk mencari bapa saudaranya, Dadah pergi menuntut ilmu dengan mahaguru lain. Malangnya Dalang hanyut dalam ketamakan harta dan kuasa sehingga sanggup membunuh Mahaguru Buana. Apabila Sakti pulang, Dalang membuat fitnah dengan mengatakan kematian Mahaguru Buana adalah angkara Dadah. Sakti bersumpah untuk menuntut bela di atas kematian bapanya.

programme.title: Panggilan Pulau
programme.desc: Percintaan antara Zulkifli dan Jelita mendapat tentangan daripada Johan yang merupakan abang kepada Jelita. Akibat sering dihina kerana tidak memiliki harta, Zulkifli membawa diri dan menjadi kelasi kapal dengan bantuan Umar dan Ramlee. Kehadiran Zulkifli di kapal itu tidak disenangi oleh Kapten dan dua orang kanannya, Musa dan Shukur. Pada suatu hari, kapal yang dinaiki Zulkifli telah karam di lautan dan dia terdampar di sebuah pulau yang bernama Kezambo. Apabila Zulkifli sedar yang dia kini berada di Pulau Kezambo, dia meminta izin kepada penghulu untuk mencari harta karun yang tersimpan di pulau itu.

programme.title: Jambatan Maut
programme.desc: Untuk mempertahankan maruah diri daripada diganggu Haron, Hamidah telah mengambil keputusan untuk terjun ke dalam sungai dari sebuah jambatan. Dia kemudiannya dibawa arus deras dan hilang entah ke mana walaupun seorang lelaki bernama Ibrahim cuba menolongnya. Ibrahim yang dihalau keluar oleh bapanya tinggal di pondok berhampiran dengan jambatan di mana Hamidah terjun ke dalam sungai. Sedang Ibrahim mengarang lagu, Hamidah telah datang kepadanya dan mula timbul bibit-bibit cinta antara mereka. Hamidah juga memberitahu kepada Ibrahim bahawa dia ingin menghukum Haron dan rakan-rakannya yang sering mengancam keamanan kampung.

programme.title: Puteri Gunung Banang
programme.desc: Wira dan dua orang abangnya, Terab dan Toba adalah tiga orang lelaki tua yang hidup di pinggir sebuah desa dalam keadaan miskin. Pada suatu hari, ketika Wira pergi ke Gunung Banang dia telah ditakdirkan untuk masuk ke alam bunian dan bertemu dengan seorang puteri. Wira terkejut apabila melihat wajahnya kembali muda. Sebelum meninggalkan alam bunian dan kembali ke alam nyata, Puteri Gunung Banang telah menghadiahkan Wira semangkuk air hikmat yang mampu menjadi penawar kepada pelbagai penyakit. Wira berjanji akan menggunakannya untuk membantu orang ramai. Apabila tiba di sebuah perkampungan, Wira berjaya memulihkan seorang gadis yang kurang siuman. Apabila berita kehebatan Wira mengubati pesakit ini tersebar, Terab dan Toba merasa iri hati dan merancang untuk melakukan sesuatu.

programme.title: Mata Shaitan
programme.desc: Ketika keluar berburu di hutan, Tengku Aman Shah telah tertarik hati dengan seorang gadis bernama Manis yang tinggal bersama bapanya pinggir hutan. Tengku Aman Shah merahsiakan identitinya yang sebenar dan menyamar sebagai seorang penyair bernama Sulaiman. Setelah mendedahkan identitinya, Tengku Aman Shah berkahwin dengan Manis secara rahsia. Ketika Tengku Aman Shah pulang ke istana kerana ayahandanya gering, Manis yang sedang hamil diganggu sekumpulan samseng sehingga mengakibatkan kematian bapanya. Manis melarikan diri ke dalam hutan dan bertemu dengan seorang tua yang berwajah hodoh. Orang tua itu memberi perlindungan kepada Manis sehingga dia melahirkan anak.

programme.title: Semerah Cindai
programme.desc: Kelana mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Mahaguru Buana untuk membalas dendam kepada orang-orang yang membunuh kedua ibu bapanya. Selepas tamat perguruan, Kelana bertemu dengan seorang lelaki tua bernama Bagok, seorang pemabuk dan kaki judi. Dia mempunyai seorang anak gadis bernama Atma. Tanpa disedari Kelana, Bagok adalah salah seorang penyamun yang membunuh ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Putera Amran, pewaris takhta kerajaan Zamin Ambar telah dititahkan oleh ayahandanya untuk berkahwin dengan Puteri Faridah dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Namun, Putera Amran tidak bersetuju dengan titah ayahandanya kerana dia mencintai seorang penari istana yang bernama Norlela. Kerajaan Zamin Tauran berasa amat terhina dan merancang sesuatu untuk mengambil alih tampuk pemerintahan kerajaan Zamin Ambar dengan cara Puteri Faridah mesti berkahwin dengan baginda sultan Zamin Tauran.

programme.title: Lanang Sejagat
programme.desc: Sitara ingin mencari pembunuh bapanya yang bernama Datuk Merah. Dalam perjalanan, dia diserang oleh sekumpulan penjahat tetapi diselamatkan oleh seorang pendekar buta bernama Kasa. Kasa memberitahu Sitara bahawa Datuk Merah telah mati. Sitara terpaksa bermalam di rumah Kasa. Ketika itulah Penghulu mengarahkan orang-orangnya berbuat baik dengan ibu Sitara yang bernama Melati dan menghantar banyak makanan. Sekembalinya Sitara ke rumah, dia berjumpa Penghulu yang meminta pertolongannya untuk membunuh Lanang Sejagat seorang pendekar yang baru muncul di kampung mereka. Suatu hari, pendekar buta Kasa dan anak perempuannya Delima berkunjung ke kampung Sitara. Ketika di rumah Sitara, terbongkarlah rahsia bahawa Kasa sebenarnya adalah Datuk Merah.

programme.title: Siti Zubaidah
programme.desc: Apabila seorang rakyatnya dihukum penjara seumur hidup atas kesalahan menipu, Kerajaan Tartar telah mengisytiharkan perang terhadap negeri Kembayat Negara yang diperintah oleh Sultan Zainal Abidin. Apabila perang meletus, kerajaan Tartar berjaya menakluk Kembayat Negara serta menangkap baginda sultan. Siti Zubaidah, isteri kepada baginda sultan merancang untuk membebaskan suaminya daripada tahanan serta menyerang kerajaan Tartar dengan bantuan kerajaan Yunan.

programme.title: Isi Neraka
programme.desc: Kedatangan agama Islam di sebuah kampung tidak disenangi oleh Wira dan rakan-rakannya. Mereka yang gemar membuat kacau di kampung itu sering mengganggu penyebaran dakwah Islam. Kehadiran Tuan Guru ke kampung itu juga telah membuatkan lebih ramai orang kampung memeluk Islam, namun Wira tetap mempersoalkan kekuasaan Tuhan.

programme.title: Putera Sangkar Maut
programme.desc: Sultan sering menyamar sebagai peminta sedekah untuk melihat sikap rakyat jelatanya dengan lebih dekat. Pada suatu hari, Sultan telah membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin dengan seorang gadis bernama Nilam dan mengahwinkan kakak Nilam yang bernama Dian dengan Mamanda Menteri. Dian enggan berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri kerana dia ingin menjadi isteri Sultan. Namun atas nasihat kekasihnya Panglima Jahang, Dian berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri sebagai satu helah untuk menggulingkan pemerintahan Sultan.

programme.title: Puteri Gunung Banang

programme.title: Satria
programme.desc: Bongkok seorang pemuda cacat sejak dia dilahirkan. Dia sering dipandang hina oleh orang kampung kerana sifatnya yang tidak sempurna. Bongkok mempunyai seorang adik bernama Putra yang handal dalam ilmu persilatan. Putra memendam perasaan terhadap Wati, anak Tok Ketua. Pada suatu hari, Putra bersama rakannya, Durja dan beberapa orang pendekar telah diarahkan untuk menjadi utusan perdamaian antara Tok Ketua dengan Panglima Jalit. Malangnya rundingan perdamaian itu gagal dan berlaku pertumpahan darah. Bongkok pula membawa diri ke suatu tempat untuk mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Pak Guru. Satu komplot telah dibuat oleh Durja untuk merampas Wati daripada Putra.

programme.title: Pendekar Sakti

programme.title: Pejalai Kamek Orang Ep5
programme.desc: Hosted and narrated by Tony Eusoff, traces locations & stories from people who have heard, experienced and witnessed events right from Brooke Era in 1841 leading up to Sarawaks independence in July 1967

programme.title: Permulaan Penciptaan Ep17
programme.desc: Kapsul informatif berkenaan permulaan sesebuah penciptaan atau pengetahuan baru dari ilmuan untuk menjadikan kehidupan masyarakat menjadi lebih baik.

programme.title: Cigu! Nadai Bisi Utai? Ep1
programme.desc: Halim, seorang guru muda lepasan maktab berusia 25 tahun dari Selangor, dilema menerima tawaran mengajar di sekolah rendah di pedalaman Sarawak. Ibu dan tunang menentang, tetapi bapanya menyokong. Dalam tempoh 30 hari, Halim berusaha memenuhi syarat melapor diri. Di Sarawak, dia menghadapi kesukaran pengangkutan dan penginapan, serta kemalangan,namun...

programme.title: Fitrah Adam Ep4
programme.desc: Fitrah Adam mengupas tentang masalah dan cabaran yang dihadapi kaum lelaki dalam kehidupan. Malah, mereka sebagai ketua keluarga dalam membina sahsiah rumah tangga dan menjadi pemimpin.

programme.title: Borneon Story S2 Ep1
programme.desc: These collection of six short documentaries aims to tell the tales of Borneo emphasizing on its culture, history, tradition and environment.

programme.title: Halik Ep5
programme.desc: Childhood lovers Jacky and Lino meet after being apart for several years. However, now married to different people, the two must choose whether to fight to be together again or be true to the promise made to their spouses.

programme.title: Terbangun Dari Mati Suri
programme.desc: Pasangan suami isteri, Firman dan Siska, yang dikenali sebagai pencuri kedai emas, kembali beraksi pada siang itu. Walau bagaimanapun, aksi jenayah mereka gagal dengan teruk kerana ditangkap salah seorang pengunjung kedai emas yang baru masuk ke kedai. Firman dan kumpulannya dengan cepat melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan diri dan bersurai. Firman berlari ke arah motornya dan secara tidak sengaja melanggar seorang kanak-kanak bernama Nina yang baru keluar dari kedai bersama ibunya membeil-belah. Firman hampir hendak memarahi Nina, tetapi Siska dengan cepat meraih tangannya dan membawanya lari dengan tergesa-gesa.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep11
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep5
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Rindu Bukan Rindu Ep37
programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. Kedua-duanya tinggal di Jepun dan menghabiskan masa bersama. Devan sentiasa berada di dekat Rindu, melindungi dan mencintainya. Hubungan di antara mereka terasa sangat rapat dan sempurna. Tetapi suatu hari, Rindu melihat Devan memegang tangan seorang wanita lain. Apakah yang terjadi di antara mereka?

programme.title: Terbangun Dari Mati Suri
programme.desc: Pasangan suami isteri, Firman dan Siska, yang dikenali sebagai pencuri kedai emas, kembali beraksi pada siang itu. Walau bagaimanapun, aksi jenayah mereka gagal dengan teruk kerana ditangkap salah seorang pengunjung kedai emas yang baru masuk ke kedai. Firman dan kumpulannya dengan cepat melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan diri dan bersurai. Firman berlari ke arah motornya dan secara tidak sengaja melanggar seorang kanak-kanak bernama Nina yang baru keluar dari kedai bersama ibunya membeil-belah. Firman hampir hendak memarahi Nina, tetapi Siska dengan cepat meraih tangannya dan membawanya lari dengan tergesa-gesa.

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep26
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat menyanyi dangdut untuk musim keenam D'Academy.

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover theyve switched bodies.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Wonderful Nightmare
programme.desc: Due to a clerical error in heaven, a lawyer who doesnt believe in love dies in a car accident. To cover their mistake, she has to live as a housewife for a month before going back to her old life.

programme.title: Boys Be!
programme.desc: When two high school friends the best fighter in school and the other who hates physical conflict get involved in a fight involving local mobsters, they discover the true meaning of friendship.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a disgraced Korean researcher who claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: The Girl On A Bulldozer
programme.desc: As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: The Wild
programme.desc: Woo-chul is released early for good behavior after 8 years in jail. His friend Do-sik invites him to join the gang but he wants to live an honest life. Can Woo-chul keep his hands clean?

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep1819
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep44
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep920921
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep714
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep490
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep1718
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her fathers MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lans MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the clubs and her honour.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamus wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clans disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score The Proud One. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clans leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld Kings sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chiefs illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his fathers death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: This delightful action comedy featuring international favourite Alexander Fu Sheng premiered two years before the American hit Ghostbusters was released. Is it a coincidence? You be the judge as you enjoy this amazing showcase of wushu and wizardry.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep2
programme.desc: This One Goes To 11 - During one last stop by a toy store before Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max's maiden voyage across the Atlantic, Ben runs into an old bully, Kevin 11, who now has new powers - able to transform into aliens just like Ben, such as the 'bootleg' doppelgnger of Cannonbolt-- Wreckingbolt!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Moor Fogg - Team Tennyson goes international in the Omni-Copter and the first stop is for a hike in the Scottish Highlands, but the weather isn't just bad, it's foggy, and that means one thing and one thing only: the return of The Fogg!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Rath Of Con - Back stateside, Ben can't get into a cat cosplay competition, Top Tail, without a costume of his own, but when he goes Rath - a new cat-like alien with an attitude - Ben's newfound wild side quickly becomes much more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep5
programme.desc: King Of The Castle - Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max next travel to Castle Bishopbrook to visit a distant relative who's royalty, but when Ben encounters a 'ghost' at the haunted home, it turns out to actually be his new rival, Kevin 11, throwing even more twisted aliens his way: Thornblade, Undertow, and Dark Matter!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Speechless On The Seine - While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Poles Apart - A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar & Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Show Don't Tell - Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Don't Touch - Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Big In Japan - During a tour of the Japanese Robotics Museum, Ben finds hero-gone-wrong Tim Buktu 'trying to save' Tokyo from a Dragon, but has Tim finally turned over a new leaf, or is this just another one of his half-baked plans to play the part of hero?

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Welcome To Zombozo-Zone! - During medieval times, Team Tennyson must fight to remember that they're not in the past at all, but actually at a Renaissance-esque faire- where 'King Zombozo' has hypnotized its guests into thinking they live in the past!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep12

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Cyber Slammers - At Biggie Box Japan, Ben waits in an epic line for the release of the latest Sumo Slammers video game, Cyber Slammers, but Ben must soon save the store- not from game-hungry customers, but from Steam Smythe, who wants to retro-fit a massive mech with steam punk powers!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep14

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 12
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr celebrate three years of embarrassing each other in this special anniversary edition. The guys reveal some never-before-seen bonus footage of their favorite moments from the vault.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 13
programme.desc: The guys have to keep a straight face as the other Jokers act out bizarre scenes, then they try to get an embarrassing word in edgewise with strangers at the park. And playtime is over for tonight's big loser when the punishment hits a little too close to home.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 14
programme.desc: The guys bite off more than they can chew serving customers at a sub shop, and they team up at a food court to perform a mystery task based on ambiguous hints from their partner. Then, the guys need their memory to get them through a series of commands, and the loser doesn't have the stomach for tonight's punishment, as he experiences the painful pangs of parenthood.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 15
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr push all the wrong buttons at a video game store, try to rope rock climbers into repeating a bizarre word, and give away fake tickets to a flop of a show.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 1
programme.desc: The guys talk ticks, tricks, and antics! What's with Murr's fool proof plans? And Joe's crazy faces? And why is Sal always falling down?! Plus, see the Jokers' best bloopers, and learn all about the guys' annoying habits that aren't captured on camera!

programme.title: Friends S3 2
programme.desc: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

programme.title: Friends S3 3
programme.desc: After breaking up with Richard, Monica uses her free time to make jam and consider insemination via a sperm bank.

programme.title: Friends S3 4
programme.desc: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll.Phoebe poses as Joey's agent and gets him some good parts.

programme.title: Friends S3 5
programme.desc: Phoebe's half-brother visits, and they have trouble bonding.

programme.title: Friends S3 6
programme.desc: When Janice asks the gang if any of them have ever slept together, the friends flash back to a time three years before.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 7
programme.desc: The curtain goes up and IQs go down as truTV brings you 20 of the dumbest performers ever to grace the stage. You'll see a Nutella-covered artist, the longest (and worst) death scene in film history, and a Japanese game show you have to see to believe. Reviewing the performances is our celebrity cast, including Danny Bonaduce, Judy Gold, Kevin McCaffrey, and Brendon Walsh.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 8
programme.desc: Join the festivities with 20 of the most pinheaded partiers ever to make the scene. From wild bachelorettes to a drunk Santa and more than you ever wanted to know about butt chugging. With crazy commentary from Danny Bonaduce and our celebrity cast,plus hot comics like Billy Kimball and Brendon Walsh.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 01
programme.desc: Michael breezes into the Windy City to shock and amaze the Chicago locals. In a health store, he sells a supplement that proves you are what you drink, and at a Metro station, he utterly derails a commuter's sense of reality.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 02
programme.desc: In a local Chicago diner, Michael brings new meaning to the term "hold the pickles." Plus, he discovers an aggressive new breed of fungus at a park, and later, he helps a coworker disappear from work early in a hospital warehouse.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 03
programme.desc: At a market, Michael reveals an amazing credit card hack, and at a science shop, he demonstrates how far stem cell research has come. Later, Michael spooks a gardener who's certain that angry gnomes are hunting him down!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 04
programme.desc: Michael discovers a ferocious new breed of animal at a park, customers are steeped in confusion when Michael invades a local tea shop, and a woman gets her feathers ruffled when she realizes she's a witness to a transformation.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 05
programme.desc: Michael reveals the transformative properties of fruits and vegetables, and shows a caterer the true power of dairy products. Plus, an antique store customer is stunned when a species of termite literally chews through the scenery!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S4 17
programme.desc: When the gang starts hanging out at Raj's and Sheldon realizes it's actually Leonard who is the center of their social group, Sheldon decides to get a new group of friends.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S4 18
programme.desc: Leonard must choose between his new girlfriend, Priya, and his friendship with Penny. Meanwhile, Howard drives Sheldon crazy with a magic trick.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S4 19
programme.desc: When someone hacks Sheldon's online gaming account, the guys go on a quest to find the culprit.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.
